screenshots.description: Payroll settings page showing Daily Wage Calculation section expanded with table of three services: Salary proration (30.45 days), EOS leave encashment (22 days), Unpaid leave deduction (30 days)
Salary Proration configuration modal showing Month calculation dropdown (Custom days selected), Number of days field (30.45), and formula display

screenshots.description: Month calculation dropdown expanded showing three options: Working days, Calendar days, Custom days (selected)
